body_html:
By using synthetic data source, the cuEventQuery is very lite, and CPU occupation is ~400%.

After giving --data-dir, it actually uses JUST ~10 additional cuMemcpyHtoDAsync calls for every mini-batch which triggers 3200% cpu occupation and this is definitely not a expected thing.
body_text:
By using synthetic data source, the cuEventQuery is very lite, and CPU occupation is ~400%.
After giving --data-dir, it actually uses JUST ~10 additional cuMemcpyHtoDAsync calls for every mini-batch which triggers 3200% cpu occupation and this is definitely not a expected thing.
body:
By using synthetic data source, the cuEventQuery is very lite, and CPU occupation is ~400%.

After giving `--data-dir`, it actually uses JUST ~10 additional `cuMemcpyHtoDAsync` calls for every mini-batch which triggers 3200% cpu occupation and this is definitely not a expected thing.
